Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Operation in Côte d’Ivoire (UNOCI) Medal Order

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the United Nations Operation in Côte d’Ivoire (UNOCI) Medal in recognition of at least 90 days continuous honourable service with that peacekeeping mission commencing on or after April 4, 2004; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that the Medal follow the United Nations Stabilization Mission in Haiti (MINUSTAH) Medal, in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
